posts.post_content:
This card is the REAL reason Wizards took out mana burn. They just assumed that everyone had one, and could sink any extra mana into instead of taking mana burn.  
  
Also, Combos with (especially in EDH)  
[Pyromancer Ascension](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyromancer Ascension )  and [Locket of Yesterdays](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Locket of Yesterdays)  
[Tarox Bladewing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tarox Bladewing), [Korlash, Heir to Blackblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Korlash, Heir to Blackblade), [Baru, Fist of Krosa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baru, Fist of Krosa), [Linessa, Zephyr Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Linessa, Zephyr Mage), and [Oriss, Samite Guardian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oriss, Samite Guardian) and  
[Leyline of Singularity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of Singularity)  
and probably quite a few more that I can't think of at the moment.
posts.html:
This card is the REAL reason Wizards took out mana burn. They just assumed that everyone had one, and could sink any extra mana into instead of taking mana burn.

Also, Combos with (especially in EDH)
Pyromancer Ascension and Locket of Yesterdays
Tarox Bladewing, Korlash, Heir to Blackblade, Baru, Fist of Krosa, Linessa, Zephyr Mage, and Oriss, Samite Guardian and

and probably quite a few more that I can't think of at the moment.

posts.post_content:
People **SERIOUSLY** need to learn how this card actually works. As a rules lawyer, it makes my skin crawl when I see all of you come up with crazy names for it.  
  
Lets take a look at the official Mark Rosewater ruling for "\_\_\_\_" in the FAQTIWDAWCC (Frequently Asked Questions That If We Didn't Answer Would Cause Chaos) http://www.wizards.com/magic/tcg/article.aspx?x=magic/faq/unhinged)):  
  
"*\_\_\_\_\_...  
  
... Can I change this card to be Jojo, the Dog-faced Lizard Boy?  
  
No.  
  
Can I change it to be Solar-Powered Ninja Penguin?  
  
No.  
  
Can I change it to be Siamese Pygmy Pole-Vaulter?  
  
No. To save us some space, maybe I should let you know what it can become. **You may change this card to have the name of any \_Magic\_ card in existence.***  
  
So, you can only change it to an actual printed card's name. You can't change it to a 4,922,084 word name. Scroll further down in the FAQTIWDAWCC and it says the same thing about the flavor text. It must be flavor text actually printed on a card in ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
People SERIOUSLY need to learn how this card actually works. As a rules lawyer, it makes my skin crawl when I see all of you come up with crazy names for it.

Lets take a look at the official Mark Rosewater ruling for "____" in the FAQTIWDAWCC (Frequently Asked Questions That If We Didn't Answer Would Cause Chaos) http://www.wizards.com/magic/tcg/article.aspx?x=magic/faq/unhinged)):

"_____...

... Can I change this card to be Jojo, the Dog-faced Lizard Boy?

No.

Can I change it to be Solar-Powered Ninja Penguin?

No.

Can I change it to be Siamese Pygmy Pole-Vaulter?

No. To save us some space, maybe I should let you know what it can become. You may change this card to have the name of any _Magic_ card in existence.

So, you can only change it to an actual printed card's name. You can't change it to a 4,922,084 word name. Scroll further down in the FAQTIWDAWCC and it says the same thing about the flavor text. It must be flavor text actually printed on a card in ... (see all)

Posted By: CorkBulb (8/21/2012 2:02:01 AM)

posts.post_content: On an unrelated note, I wonder how much thought went into making his Oracle name five underscore characters. Anyone searching with five or less will get this card (because it's the only card in oracle with any), but anyone putting in six or more will see no results. Of course, if you required many more, say 26 underscores, a direct AutoCard link would be a tiresome thing to write (and difficult to do correctly).

posts.post_content:
Just like any other activated ability unless otherwise stated it can only by activated when it is in play.   
So...  
  
@GladiusLucix  
Pyromancer Ascension and Locket of Yesterdays don't work since the cards name will always be \_\_\_\_\_ when it's in your graveyard  
grandeur doesn't work since the cards name will always be \_\_\_\_\_ when its in your hand   
  
@KokoshoForPresident   
None of the heralds can tutor this card into play since its name will always be \_\_\_\_\_ when its in your library.  
  
Who ever came up with evil twin that does work and is awesomely funny congrats to you on actually knowing how activated abilities work.
posts.html:
Just like any other activated ability unless otherwise stated it can only by activated when it is in play.
So...

@GladiusLucix
Pyromancer Ascension and Locket of Yesterdays don't work since the cards name will always be _____ when it's in your graveyard
grandeur doesn't work since the cards name will always be _____ when its in your hand

@KokoshoForPresident
None of the heralds can tutor this card into play since its name will always be _____ when its in your library.

Who ever came up with evil twin that does work and is awesomely funny congrats to you on actually knowing how activated abilities work.

posts.post_content:
Change its name to [Peer Through Depths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Peer Through Depths), or [Reach Through Mists](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reach Through Mists) (not [Sift Through Sands](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sift Through Sands) though, you need its second effect to go off) while in your hand, and you only need one of the mentioned cards and [Sift Through Sands](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sift Through Sands) to pull off the combo.  
  
If you also have [Urza's Hot Tub](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urza's Hot Tub) on the field, you only need two of the cards at all, even if they're the same. You can search another one using the word "through."  
  
Come to think of it, [Urza's Hot Tub](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urza's Hot Tub) and this card work beautifully together no matter what you're doing with them.
posts.html:
Change its name to Peer Through Depths, or Reach Through Mists (not Sift Through Sands though, you need its second effect to go off) while in your hand, and you only need one of the mentioned cards and Sift Through Sands to pull off the combo.

If you also have Urza's Hot Tub on the field, you only need two of the cards at all, even if they're the same. You can search another one using the word "through."

Come to think of it, Urza's Hot Tub and this card work beautifully together no matter what you're doing with them.
